about_the_game:
Tired of the same old black-and-white storylines? Dive into the world of Shaola, where the lines between good and evil are blurred and nothing is as it seems!

This isn't your classic fairy tale. Embark on a journey filled with action-packed battles, ancient mysteries, and heart-wrenching decisions that will test your courage and wits. Every character you encounter is a puzzle waiting to be solved - their motives as mysterious as the lands you'll traverse. Will you see through the masks they wear?

In this world, things are rarely as they seem. Will you trust the charming rogue or the stern paladin? Can you spot a true ally amidst a sea of deception? Every choice you make will shape your destiny and the fate of the realms.

Get a taste of the action now! Download the demo and play the first part of Heroes of Shaola. Your journey begins here, but where it leads... that's up to you.

In this demo, you will step into the shoes of a young paladin who has been kidnapped and thrown into an unfamiliar kingdom. Your adventure begins as you navigate the challenges of your new environment, where you'll encounter a group of agents who come to your rescue beyond the snowy desert.

As you progress, you'll face the harsh realities of betrayal and manipulation, with various factions vying for your allegiance to leverage their own agendas. Your journey will lead you to a pivotal meeting with a knight and his elven daughter, marking a significant turning point in your epic quest. Successfully completing this demo will prompt you to return to the main game store page on Steam, where you can purchase the full game and continue your adventure.

reviews:
“This game needs to be played at least twice to find all hidden areas. great storyline with many questions and political overtures. (63.6 hrs at review time)”
Recommended – Prudenceanne

“The design was very similar to Final Fantasy Mystic Quest, where you not only have traditional JRPG battles but also have ARPG elements to interact with the environment. This game takes it a step further with corpse looting.”
Recommended – Robert Starphoenix

“This game is great, nice graphics, great story and very exciting.”
Recommended – TaelCZ
short_description: Take on the role of a young paladin trying to survive in a corrupt world filled with compelling actions, thrilling drama and political incorrectness while opposing factions do their best to outwit each other.
